com.cscguru.client.entities

Class MobStat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cscguru.client.entities.MobStat

  • public class MobStat
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds the information that pertains to a mob such as minimum and maximum damage, hp, level, bonus experience and more.
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MobStat()
      Default constructor.
      MobStat(int minDmg, int maxDmg, int hp, int level, java.lang.String name, boolean isHostile)
      Initializes a new MobStat instance.
      MobStat(MobStat m)
      Copies the MobStat.
